channel.title: Bb-blud.GitHub.io
channel.description: Hi! This site is just intended to display old and current projects of mine

item.title: water_spout
item.description:
This is a prototype for a drum machine/synthesizer app with the intention of being super fun and addictive. It was my final sketch for “Creative Programing For digital media and mobile Apps” by proffs Grillies, Yee-King, Grierson on Coursera. Its written in Processing and parsed to javascript with processing.js.

You can find the mess of files here. My intention now is to rewrite a new and improved version in pure JavaScript using the p5.js library. You can try it out here :)
